paragraphs.body: B-class articles are articles of high standard written to a professional exemplar. They are denoted by the ${link_0} hat icon.
paragraphs.text: B-class articles are articles of high standard written to a professional exemplar. They are denoted by the Earth King's hat icon.

paragraphs.body: This recognition is separate from ${link_0}, which are articles that have been, or are featured on the main page. They are also different than ${link_1}, in the sense that B-class are articles of good quality that have been chosen to enhance their visibility whereas A-class are articles of excellent quality.
paragraphs.text: This recognition is separate from featured articles, which are articles that have been, or are featured on the main page. They are also different than A-class articles, in the sense that B-class are articles of good quality that have been chosen to enhance their visibility whereas A-class are articles of excellent quality.

paragraphs.body: B-class articles are promoted and demoted by the users that make up the ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: B-class articles are promoted and demoted by the users that make up the Standards Council.
